tool.name: OGS: ExtractSurface
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ExtractSurface'.
tool.command: ExtractSurface $ascii_output #if str($angle): --angle '$angle' #end if #if str($z_component): --z-component '$z_component' #end if #if str($y_component): --y-component '$y_component' #end if #if str($x_component): --x-component '$x_component' #end if #if str($mesh_output_file): --mesh-output-file '$mesh_output_file' #end if --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file'

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: If the switch is set use ascii instead of binary format for data in the vtu output.

param.name: angle
param.label: angle
param.help: tolerated angle (in degrees) between given normal and element normal

param.name: mesh_output_file
param.label: mesh output file
param.help: the file the surface mesh should be written to

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: the file containing the input mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **ExtractSurface** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
